cfallin commented on Issue #1729:

I've written out a semi-formal proof in the comments and added some assertions. Hopefully this is clearer! Will land with your existing approval since this is a correctness issue (and changes since approval are mostly comments); but I'm happy to further clarify the proof if needed.
